StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Discovering New Targets for Chemoprevention in Familial Adenomatous Polyposis

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN AT ANN ARBORUNIVERSITY OF TX MD ANDERSON CAN CTR
UNIVERSITY OF TX MD ANDERSON CAN CTR

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The data generated from patients with FAP was supported by grants R03CA176788, the MD Anderson Cancer Center Institutional Research Grant (IRG) Program, and a gift from the Feinberg Familty to E. Vilar.; A full description of the subjects, samples, and sequencing methods can be found at 23. Borras E, San Lucas FA, Chang K, Zhou R, Masand G, Fowler J, Mork ME, You YN, Taggart MW, McAllister F, Jones DA, Davies GE, Edelmann W, Ehli EA, Lynch PM, Hawk ET, Capella G, Scheet P*, Vilar E*. Genomic Landscape of Colorectal Mucosa and Adenomas. Cancer Prev Res (Phila) 9(6):417-27, 6/2016. e-Pub 5/2016. PMCID: PMC4941624.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB, PUB, COL, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB-PUB-COL-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s). Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB, PUB, COL, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB-PUB-COL-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s). Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
